entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: MagicKit Pro: AI Smart Toolbox
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

MagicKit AI ‚Äì All-in-One Device and Utility Toolkit MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life. Device and System Tools ‚Ä¢ Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state ‚Ä¢ Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage ‚Ä¢ Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details ‚Ä¢ Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running ‚Ä¢ Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage ‚Ä¢ Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space ‚Ä¢ Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries ‚Ä¢ RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance ‚Ä¢ Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance Network Tools ‚Ä¢ Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed ‚Ä¢ Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status ‚Ä¢ IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses ‚Ä¢ Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude Security & Privacy Tools ‚Ä¢ Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options ‚Ä¢ Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases ‚Ä¢ UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats ‚Ä¢ Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options ‚Ä¢ Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection Utility Tools ‚Ä¢ Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements ‚Ä¢ Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies ‚Ä¢ Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support ‚Ä¢ Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status ‚Ä¢ Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events ‚Ä¢ Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks ‚Ä¢ QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly ‚Ä¢ Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition ‚Ä¢ Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors ‚Ä¢ Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app ‚Ä¢ Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone ‚Ä¢ Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session ‚Ä¢ Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness ‚Ä¢ Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup ‚Ä¢ Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more Highlights ‚Ä¢ Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools ‚Ä¢ Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities ‚Ä¢ No ads or in-app purchases ‚Ä¢ Lightweight and battery-efficient ‚Ä¢ Compatible with all iOS devices ‚Ä¢ Frequent updates with new tools ‚Ä¢ Built with privacy and performance in mind ‚Ä¢ Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations Perfect for ‚Ä¢ Device monitoring and optimization ‚Ä¢ Everyday measurement and conversion tasks ‚Ä¢ Scanning documents and QR codes ‚Ä¢ Cleaning up photo storage and contacts ‚Ä¢ Creating and managing countdowns with reminders ‚Ä¢ Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters ‚Ä¢ Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control ‚Ä¢ Performing simple network diagnostics ‚Ä¢ Generating secure passwords and managing privacy ‚Ä¢ Taking quick notes and organizing information Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

entry.title: Pasha Planet: Reborn
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$0.99 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

‚ÄúPasha Planet: Reborn‚Äù is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters‚Äô daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay. [Game Overview] The story takes place on the distant planet of Pasha. A prosperous underground city, which are inhabited by adorable doggies, can be found there. They live in peace day after day, enjoying the convenience brought about by technology. However, the protagonist Bobbie, who grew up in the city, often fantasizes about getting out of the closed-off Underground City to see the world outside. This is where the main story line of the game begins. Players will take on the role of Bobbie and explore the seemingly calm and peaceful city, which is in actual fact, facing an energy crisis. Players must clear stages of challenges to solve the final mystery and figure out a way to save all the inhabitants before disaster strikes! [Game Features] - Created by an independent game development studio in Taiwan. - Classic click-and-point puzzle-solving gameplay. - Charming and heartwarming hand-painted scenes. - Challenging puzzles and stages.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Little Big Workshop
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

Imagine a magical factory, appearing right in your living room. A carefully planned masterpiece, where diligent workers throw together anything customers want. Rubber ducks and dressers, drones and electric guitars, scooters and other wonderful goods can be created from many different materials and sold for hard cash ‚Äì cash you invest right back into your factory to get more machines, more workers and grow your business. In Little Big Workshop you become a factory tycoon! Real factories - made FUN You are the Big Boss and it‚Äôs time to take charge of your very own tabletop factory. Organize the factory floor, manage your workers, purchase machinery, and design efficient production lines - all within the time-limit and to your client's satisfaction! An open-ended sandbox-experience Take it easy, it‚Äôs a sandbox-experience where you think, ponder and poke at things until you get it to work the way you‚Äôd like. Supply products to clients and an ever-changing market, as you produce over 50 unique product types, built from multiple parts and pieces - all of which can be created with different materials and production methods. No two factories should ever look the same. Tiny hands, big dreams Start out with just a small workshop and expand to a desk-filling factory. Unlock ever fancier machines, add even more production methods, and most of all, more room. Soon enough you‚Äôll be running multiple production lines, producing hundreds of advanced products each day, and watching with joy as your cute workers do the actual work. Features: - Varying industries and a wide range of products - Focus on practical problems, not on values, economics, or logistics - Organize all steps of the production on a blueprint - Factories grow as you unlock more desk space - Fully simulated Day/Night-cycle - Take care of your workers! Work them too hard and they drop like flies - Cute model-town art-style

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Wreckfest
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $3.99 [$1.99 ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$3.99

In-App Purchases

  • Content Bundle 1Ôºö$9.99
  • Content Bundle 2Ôºö$7.99
  • Getaway Car PackÔºö$2.99
  • Modified Monsters Car PackÔºö$2.99
  • Racing Heroes Car PackÔºö$2.99
  • Off-Road Car PackÔºö$2.99
  • Steel & Wheels PackÔºö$1.99
  • American All-Stars Car PackÔºö$2.99
  • Banger Racing Car PackÔºö$2.99
  • Rusty Rats Car PackÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Burn rubber and shred metal in the ultimate driving playground! Wreckfest is jam-packed with upgrade and customization options. Whether you are preparing for your next demolition derby with reinforced bumpers, roll cages, side protectors and much more, or setting your car up for a banger race with engine performance parts like air filters, camshafts, fuel systems, etc., Wreckfest is shaping up to be the best combative motorsport game out there. ‚Ä¢ Unique Racing Experience ‚Äì Exhilarating no-rules racing action with defining, once-in-a-lifetime moments that can be achieved only with a true-to-life physics simulation. Witness insane neck-to-neck fighting on high-speed circuits, face total destruction madness on crazy courses with intersections and oncoming traffic, or go for demolition dominance in derby arenas. ‚Ä¢ Awesome Cars ‚Äì Our cars are old, banged up, patched together... They ooze style and character! From old American heavy-hitters to agile Europeans and fun Asians, you won‚Äôt find anything like this in other games. ‚Ä¢ Meaningful Customization ‚Äì Change not only the look of your cars but also upgrade their body armor ‚Äì Reinforce them with heavy iron that protects you from damage, but also adds weight, which impacts the cars handling. Modify your car to make a robust tank or a fragile but lightning-fast rocket, or anything in between! ‚Ä¢ Multiplayer ‚Äì Wreck your friends in local multiplayer and take racing to the limit while chasing for demolition dominance! ‚Ä¢ Challenge modes ‚Äì Have hilarious fun with crop harvesters, lawn mowers, school buses, three-wheelers and much more! ‚Ä¢ Career Mode ‚Äì Battle for championships, earn experience, unlock new upgrades and cars, and become the all-time Wreckfest champion! ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: FocusDots ¬∑ Focus What Matters
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps: 1) Decide on a single task to be done. 2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes). 3) Take a short break (5 minutes). 4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes) Features - Elegant minimalist design - Daily Summary - Beautiful crafted design themes - Quotes to inspire and motivate you - Custom timer duration for your tasks Thank you for choosing FocusDots! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope that our app helps you enhance your productivity and time management skills. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

ËøôÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ¨æÂÖ≥‰∫éÁîü„ÄÅÊ≠ª„ÄÅÂøÉÊÑø‰∏éÂª∂Áª≠ÁöÑApp„ÄÇ Â∞èÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÊàë‰ª•‰∏∫Ëá™Â∑±ÊòØ‰∏ç‰ºöËÄÅÂéªÁöÑÂΩºÂæó¬∑ÊΩòÔºåÂç¥ÁªàÁ©∂Êïå‰∏çËøáÂÅ•Â∫∑Á£®ÊçüÔºåÂÆπÈ¢úËÄÅÂéª„ÄÇ Êó∂ÈíàËΩ¨Âä®ÔºåÁîüÂëΩÊµÅÈÄùÔºå‰ΩÜÊØè‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÂøÉË∑≥ÈÉΩÂèØ‰ª•Êõ¥Âä†ÊúâÂäõ„ÄÇ ÊúâÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÁîüÂëΩÂè™ÊòØ‰∏ÄËøû‰∏≤ÁöÑÊï∞Â≠óÔºåÂ§öÂ∞ëÂπ¥ÔºåÂ§öÂ∞ëÊúàÔºåÂ§öÂ∞ëÂ∞èÊó∂ÔºåÂ§öÂ∞ëÂàÜÈíü„ÄÇÂΩì‰Ω†ÊÑèËØÜÂà∞Ëøô‰∏™Êó∂ÔºåÂæÄÂæÄÈô∑ÂÖ•Â∑®Â§ßÁöÑËôöÊó†ÊÑü‰πã‰∏≠ÔºåÊÉ∂ÊÅê‰∏çËÉΩËá™Êãî„ÄÇ ËÄåÁé∞Âú®ÔºåËøô‰∫õÊï∞Â≠óÂèØ‰ª•Êàê‰∏∫‰Ω†ÈáçÂ°ëÁîüÂëΩÁöÑÂùêÊ†áÔºåÊåáÂºï‰Ω†Ëµ∞ÂêëÊõ¥ÂÅ•Â∫∑„ÄÅÊõ¥Èïø‰πÖÁöÑÊú™Êù•„ÄÇ ÁîüËæ∞ 2.0 ÈÄöËøá AI ÂàÜÊûêÂíåÁßëÂ≠¶Âà§Êñ≠Ôºå‰∏ç‰ªÖÈ¢ÑÊµãÁîüÂëΩÁöÑÁªàÁÇπÔºåÊõ¥‰∏∫‰Ω†Èì∫Â∞±Âª∂ÈïøÁîüÂëΩÁöÑÈÅìË∑ØÔºö - Êé¢Á¥¢‰Ω†ÁöÑÁîüÂëΩÊó∂ÈíüÔºö‰∫ÜËß£ÂΩì‰∏ãÁöÑÈ¢ÑÊúüÂØøÂëΩÔºåÁõ¥Èù¢ÁîüÂëΩÁöÑÊúâÈôê‰∏éÁèçË¥µ„ÄÇ - ÂèëÁé∞Âª∂ÂØøÁöÑÂèØËÉΩÔºöÁúãËßÅÊîπÂèòÂÅ•Â∫∑‰π†ÊÉØËÉΩ‰∏∫‰Ω†Â∏¶Êù•Â§öÂ∞ëÈ¢ùÂ§ñÁöÑÁîüÂëΩÊó∂ÂÖâ„ÄÇ - ËÅöÂêàÂÅ•Â∫∑Êï∞ÊçÆÔºöËá™Âä®ËøΩË∏™Áù°Áú†„ÄÅÈîªÁÇº„ÄÅÂéãÂäõÔºàHRVÔºâ„ÄÅÁªèÊúü„ÄÅÂñùÊ∞¥Á≠âÂçÅ‰ΩôÁßçÂÅ•Â∫∑Êï∞ÊçÆ ÁæéÂõΩËØó‰∫∫Á∫≥¬∑ÊñØÂæÖÂ∞îÂú®87Â≤ÅÈÇ£Âπ¥ÂÜôÈÅìÔºö "Â¶ÇÊûúÊàëËÉΩÂ§ü‰ªéÂ§¥Ê¥ªËøáÔºåÊàë‰ºöËØïÁùÄÁäØÊõ¥Â§öÁöÑÈîô„ÄÇ Êàë‰ºöÊîæÊùæ‰∏ÄÁÇπÔºåÊàë‰ºöÁÅµÊ¥ª‰∏ÄÁÇπ„ÄÇ Êàë‰ºöÁà¨Êõ¥Â§öÁöÑÂ±±ÔºåÊ∏∏Êõ¥Â§öÁöÑÊ≤≥ÔºåÁúãÊõ¥Â§öÁöÑÊó•ËêΩ„ÄÇ" Âõ†‰∏∫‰∫ÜËß£ÁîüÂëΩÁöÑÁªàÁÇπÔºåÊâçËÉΩÊõ¥Â•ΩÂú∞ÁèçÊÉúÂΩì‰∏ãÁöÑÊØè‰∏ÄÂàª„ÄÇÁîüËæ∞2.0 Êé¢Á¥¢ÂÅ•Â∫∑ÁöÑÂèØËÉΩÔºåËÆ©Êàë‰ª¨Êàê‰∏∫‰Ω†ÂÅ•Â∫∑ÊóÖÁ®ãÁöÑÈïø‰πÖ‰ºô‰º¥„ÄÇ „ÄêÁîüËæ∞ App ‰ºöÂëòÊúçÂä°ËØ¥Êòé„Äë 1.‰ºöÂëòÂåÖÂê´Âá†ÁßçËÆ¢Ë¥≠Á±ªÂûã ËÆ¢ÈòÖÂë®ÊúüÔºö1‰∏™Êúà„ÄÅ3‰∏™Êúà„ÄÅ12‰∏™Êúà 2.È¶ñÊ¨°ËÆ¢Ë¥≠Âêé‰ºöÈÄöËøáiTunesË¥¶Êà∑Áõ¥Êé•ÊîØ‰ªòÔºõË¥¶Êà∑‰ºöÂú®Âà∞ÊúüÂâç24Â∞èÊó∂ÂÜÖÊâ£Ë¥πÔºåÊâ£Ë¥πÊàêÂäüÂêéËá™Âä®È°∫Âª∂‰∏Ä‰∏™ËÆ¢ÈòÖÂë®Êúü 3.Êú¨ÊúçÂä°Áî±ÊÇ®Ëá™‰∏ªÈÄâÊã©ÊòØÂê¶Áª≠ËÆ¢ÔºåÂ¶ÇÈúÄÂèñÊ∂àÔºåËØ∑Âú®ËÆ¢ÈòÖÂà∞Êúü24Â∞èÊó∂ÂâçÔºåÂú® AppleID ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏≠ÂèñÊ∂à 4.ÁîüËæ∞App ‰ºöÂëòÂçèËÆÆ ÁîüËæ∞App ‰ºöÂëòÊúçÂä°ÂçèËÆÆÔºöhttps://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/ 5.ÁîüËæ∞App ËΩØ‰ª∂ÂçèËÆÆ‰∏éÈöêÁßÅÊîøÁ≠ñ ÁîüËæ∞ ËΩØ‰ª∂ËÆ∏ÂèØÂèäÊúçÂä°ÂçèËÆÆÔºöhttps://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/ ÁîüËæ∞ ÈöêÁßÅÂçèËÆÆÔºöhttps://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

entry.title: Religion inc. God Simulator
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • All at onceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $1.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.29

In-App Purchases

  • All at onceÔºö$0.99
  • Game modesÔºö$0.99
  • Chests in the seaÔºö$0.99
  • DestructiveÔºö$0.49
  • ShamanismÔºö$0.49
  • TotalitarianÔºö$0.49
  • PantheonÔºö$0.49

Application Description

You are reading this text. But why? Are you looking for a game, or has the game found you? Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game. It is a simulation of creating a new reality. Will you shape faith, or will faith shape you? Humanity has always sought light in the darkness. It has always longed to believe in something greater, something that gives meaning to existence. That‚Äôs how religions were born ‚Äì as beacons in the storms of history, as compasses in the ocean of life. What if you become the creator of a religion? What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality? You are the Creator. You are the source. You are the inspiration. And if you are reading this text ‚Äì you‚Äôre already in the game! All that‚Äôs left is to install ‚Äì and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions! Become the source of faith ‚Äì in the strategy simulator Religion Inc. Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness. There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity. Game Features *A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions! *Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more! *Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours! *Hundreds of real-world religious aspects ‚Äì and even more to come! Learn more about world religions! *Unique active abilities for each archetype ‚Äì perform miracles and change the world! *Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy! Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator ‚Äì Religion Inc. Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

entry.title: Cultist Simulator
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$1.99 ~ $6.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

In-App Purchases

  • Forbidden BundleÔºö$6.99
  • The DancerÔºö$1.99
  • The GhoulÔºö$1.99
  • The PriestÔºö$1.99
  • The ExileÔºö$4.99

Application Description

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES. BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck! In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age. Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we‚Äôre bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile. ‚Ä¢ Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history. Cultist Simulator doesn‚Äôt hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you‚Äôll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees. ‚Ä¢ Intense, immersive narrative ‚Äì Combine cards to tell your own story. A hefty novel‚Äôs worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end. ‚Ä¢ A rich Lovecraftian world ‚Äì Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies. Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft‚Äôs tales to an entirely new setting. Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics... ‚Ä¢ The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal ‚Ä¢ The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened ‚Ä¢ The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit ‚Ä¢ The Exile - Some there are who will not yield If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on ‚ÄúContact us‚Äù at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Codenames
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket. A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking --------------------------------------------------- Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone. Inspired by the Iconic Board Game ---------------------------------- Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chv√°til, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon. More Content, More Fun ------------------------- While staying true to the original‚Äôs clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames. Play Anytime, Anywhere ------------------------ With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges. Build Your Secret Agent Career ------------------------------- Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster! Connect and Compete with Friends ----------------------------------- Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words. Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!
